directions: Mix paprika, chili powder, curry powder, cumin, garlic powder, turmeric, cardamom, coriander, onion powder, mustard, fennel seeds, garam masala, sage, salt, black pepper, and ginger together in a bowl.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons garlic powder, or more to taste
1 teaspoon garam masala, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Indian Chicken Rub
